subject: Basketball
Women
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: No longer does Sooners basketball resemble the friends-and-family nature of a cellphone plan. Against Purdue, Oklahoma will seek to break the state record of 13,611 for a women’s game.
snippet: No longer does Sooners basketball resemble the friends-and-family nature of a cellphone plan. Against Purdue, Oklahoma will seek to break the state record of 13,611 for a women’s game.
